org.openscience.cdk.io.program
Class GaussianInputWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.openscience.cdk.io.DefaultChemObjectWriter
      org.openscience.cdk.io.program.GaussianInputWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
IChemObjectIO, IChemObjectWriter
@TestClass(value="org.openscience.cdk.io.program.GaussianInputWriterTest")
public class GaussianInputWriter
extends DefaultChemObjectWriter

File writer thats generates input files for Gaussian calculation jobs. It was tested with Gaussian98.

Author:
Egon Willighagen
Keywords:
Gaussian (tm), input file
Belongs to CDK module:
io
